{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3678078,"name":"Sara Sariowan","username":"ssariowan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/8edcca/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-07-10T05:52:32.441Z","cooked":"

2485 2025 Summer CADathon Poster1728×2304 396 KB

With several requests for a summer CADathon, Team 2485 Overclocked presents Harvest Hunt! In this CADathon, participants will have three weeks to design and CAD a robot for a new FRC game created by the Overclocked design department in collaboration with Judah, FRC Alum. This is a great way to practice collaboration with your team (or with other FRC members) and brush up on your CAD skills. Submissions will be judged based on creativity, strategic choices, competitiveness, practicality, and aesthetic.

The game manual will be released July 19, 9AM PST and submissions are due August 9, 11:30PM PST (times subject to change).

To receive any updates, ask questions, get the game manual and submit your design, please join our Discord Server: Summer CADathon

We can’t wait to see what you all design!

The judging process isn’t point based, it’s done by comparison. The judging process begins by us putting together a roster of candidates for each award and then narrowing each award down to one submission by comparing the submissions of all the candidates for that award. The written portion allows the judges to better understand your submission and provides insights into your design and design process that we couldn’t have gathered otherwise.
